div.p: KILLERS. THANKS FOR READING THE BOOK.
FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
AMERICANS LOVE ZOMBIES. WHY?
MY COLUMN THIS WEEK TRIES TO EXPLAIN IT.
READ IT IN FINE PAPERS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.
THE MANIA IS STRANGE BECAUSE ZOMBIES HAVE BEEN AROUND FOR
ZOMBIES HAVE BEEN AROUND FOR DECAUSE OF DEATHS.
>> SOUNDS LIKE TROUBLE. >> RIGHT THERE IS A GOOD
ARGUMENT FOR GUN CONTROL. THE GUY IS SHOOTING -- LAST
NIGHT "THE WALKING DEAD," VERY FRIGHTENING, WAS WATCHED BY 16
MILLION AMERICANS. WHY DO SO MANY PEOPLE WANT TO
SEE THE UNDEAD EAT FOLKS? ISN’T THERE SOMETHING SADISTIC
ABOUT IT? MY BEST GUESS IS WE LIVE IN A
GROSSED OUT WORLD WHERE ANYTHING GOES.
WHY NOT CANNIBALISM? FOR ME, I WILL LISTEN TO THE
ZOMBIE SAYING SHE’S NOT THERE BUT THAT’S ABOUT IT.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY IS A QUESTION.
IS ZOMBIE ENTERTAINMENT REALLY LIVEN HANSING?
THAT’S A BIT WIND CHIMISH BUT WORTH THE THOUGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE.
